projectsEN.name: BasketMap
projectsEN.description: BasketMap is a collaborative platform for mapping basketball courts, where anyone can register locations, game days, and other relevant info. It was created to solve a common problem among amateur players: the difficulty of finding available courts nearby. Our mission is to strengthen the basketball community by promoting connection, inclusion, and new friendships on and off the court.

projectsEN.name: NeoOrbit E-commerce
projectsEN.description: NeoOrbit E-commerce is a project developed in HTML, CSS, Javascript, React, Vite and TailwindCss as an integrative project for the Introduction to Programming course focused on Front-end. NeoOrbit is a fictitious company that sells satellite service plans and satellite models to other companies.

projectsEN.name: NeoOrbit API
projectsEN.description: NeoOrbit is a project being developed in NodeJS Express with PostgreSQL. It is a REST API that will store the data from the satellites and service plans offered by NeoOrbit.
